name: com.unity.xr.windowsmr
description: Provides implementation and support for Unity XR SDK, allowing integration and use of Windows Mixed Reality devices.

samples.description: Basic sample showing how to setup and connect an application to a remote instance running on HoloLens v2 device.

_upm.changelog:
* Fix crash when using Shared Depth Buffer option in the Windows Mixed Reality Settings.
* Add error to build when using DX12 graphics api as this is not supported.
